summary: The implementation successfully converts the single-page application to a multi-page navigation structure with 6 separate routes. All requirements are substantially implemented including React Router setup, individual page components with correct content, navigation buttons, interactive features (moving No button, heart animation), and consistent theming. The diff shows complete implementation of routing, page components, and documentation for image replacement.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with caffeine.ai attribution and copyright year
hallucinated_features.reason: The Layout component includes a footer with caffeine.ai branding and dynamic copyright year, which was not requested in any requirement
The index.css file includes extensive dark mode color definitions (.dark class) that were not requested in the requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Extended Tailwind color palettes with chart and sidebar colors
hallucinated_features.reason: Tailwind config includes chart colors (chart-1 through chart-5) and sidebar color system that were not part of the requirements
